resources.string: At ACME meat shops we put at your disposal the best meat and prepared dishes, among other gourmet delicacies. If you are hosting an event and want to impress your guests with the finest, healthiets and tastiests product, contact us.
Please, accept the Location permission dialog that appears when you enter the application so we can show you where the nearest shops are located using the map.
Visit us at any location of your convenience:
Place your order today and tomorrow you will have it waiting for you on your doorstep!
We do not have plastic wrapped bundles. Our cut is crafted with care and professional.
There was an error while connecting to the Twitter services.
These tweets will show you what the people think about our meat!
